titleStmt.title: SII 14.191: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 191. (A.R. No. 393 of 1929-30.) ĀTTŪR, TIRUCHCHENDUR TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE SŌMANĀTHA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record is dated in the 25th year of the reign of Māṟāvārmāṉ Vikrama-Chōḷapāṇḍyadēva and registers an agreement given by the aganāḻigai-śivabrāhmaṇas, i.e, the priests in charge of the inner precincts of the temple to the temple authorities to the effect that they will conduct the items of charity, namely, the provision of milk-porridge to the god Sōmanāthadēva at Āṟṟūr in Rājādhirāja-chaturvēdimaṅgalam and feeding fifteen Śivabrāhmaṇas in the temple on each amāvāsyā day every month for which a gift of money had been made by Kaṇḍaṉ-Ayyaṉār of Maṅgalakkāl. This amount was invested on the purchase of some lands, and from the annual pro duce of these lands, the charity was to be conducted.
The donor Kaṇḍaṉ-Ayyaṉār is also called Nṛipaśikhāmaṉi-Mūvēndavēḷār, evidently after the biruda of some royal personage but whose surname Nṛipaśikhāmaṉi was is not ascertainable.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . komāṟavanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīvikkiramacoḻapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 5āvatu rājarājap pāṇṭināṭṭu Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu kuṭanāṭṭu brahmateyam śrīrājādhi rājac caruppetimaṅkalattu Āṟṟūr śrīsomaṉāta tevar civabrā
hmaṇaṉ nārāyaṇaṉ piccaṉum viṉācakaṉ taṇṭi paṭṭaṉum pākkaraṉ comaṉum comaṉ taṇṭiyum Uḷḷiṭṭa Akanāḻikaiyom Ittevarkaṉmikaḷukku Oṭṭik kaittiṭ ṭiṭṭuk kuṭutta paricāvatu . maṅkalakkāluṭaiyār kaṇṭaṉ Aiyyaṉārāṉa nirupacikāmaṇi muventave
ḷār Ittevar koyilil ceyta nivan=tañ celuttukaikku Ittevar paṇṭārattu Oṭukkiṉa kāciṭṭu śrī rājādhirājac caruppetima
ṅkalattu sabhaiyār pakkal koṇṭa nilam tirunārāyaṇavayakkal Uḷḷiṭṭa nilam Ivaṉ tiruttaṟat tiruttit tantamaiyil I
nnilam nāṅkaḷey kaikkoṇṭu payireṟṟiyum payireṟṟuviccum Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟum comaṉātaṉ marakkālāl A
ḷakkakkaṭava nellu Eḻupatiṉkalam Innellu Eḻupatiṉ kalattiluṅ kār pātiyum picāṉam pāti yum Aḷantu nāṅkaḷ celuttakkaṭa
va nivantamāvaṉa . Ittevaṟku māsam prati Amāvāsināḷ pāṟpoṉakattukku vaitta paḻavarici patiṉāḻikku nellu mukkuṟuṇi Oru nāḻiyum
paruppu Irunāḻikku nel laṟu nāḻiyum pāl kuṟuṇikku nellu patakkiru nāḻiyum
caṟkarai Irupalattukku nellu kuṟuṇiyum porikkaṟi Amutukku nellu Irunāḻi
yum neyyuḻakkukku nellukkuṟuṇiyum Aṭaikkāyamutukku nellu nāṉāḻiyum kucakkalat tukkum viṟa
kukkum nel Ēḻunāḻiyum tāmaraip paḷḷittāmam nūṟukku nellu nāṉāḻiyum Āka Amāvāsi Oṉṟiṉukku
nellu Irutūṇip patakkirunāḻiyāka Orāṭṭaikku nellu patiṉkalaṉe mukkuṟuṇiyum Amāvāsinā
ḷ Ikkoyilil Uṇṇakkaṭava civabrāhmaṇar patiṉaiyvaṟkup perā larici Irunāḻiyāka A
rici mukkuṟuṇi Aṟunāḻikkum neyyurikkum caṟkarai Oru palattukkum parup pirunāḻikku
m tayir kuṟuṇikkum poḻkaṟi muṉṟukkum Ilaikkaṟi Oṉṟukkum Uppukkum puḷikku miḷa kukkum kucakkala
ttukkum pākku muppatukkum veṟṟilai yeṇpatukkum Aṭuvāṉukkum viṟakiṭuvāṉukkum brāhma
ṇaruṇṇu miṭameḻukuvāṟkum neṟ kuṟuvāḷukkumāka Amāvāsi yoṉṟiṉukku nellu kalaṉe
yirutūṇip patakkirunāḻiyāka Orāṭṭaikku nellu Irupattiru kalaṉe mukkuṟuṇiyum Ikkoyi
lil Ucciyampotu cantiyil civayokikaḷukku nittamum Oṭukkik kuṭukka kaṭava caṭṭic co
ṟoṉṟiṉuk kaṭu marici yirunāḻikkum poḻkaṟi Añcukkum ney Oru piṭikkum tayirurik
kum Uppukkum puḷikku miḷakukkum pākkiraṇṭukkum veṟṟilaiyañcukkuñ caṭṭi
ccoṟaṭuvāṟkum viṟakiṭuvāṉukkumāka nāḷoṉṟiṉukku nellu kuṟuṇi
yirunāḻiyāka Orāṭṭaikku nellu muppatteḻukalaṉe tūṇippatakku
m Āka nellu Eḻupatiṉ kalattukkum Ippaṭi nivantam Ittevakaṉmikaḷ
kaṇkāṇippaṭiye can=titarātittavaṟ celuttakkaṭavomākavum meṟpaṭiyār pa
kkala nāṅkaḷ poliyūṭṭākak koṇṭa kācu Iraṇṭukkup policai cekuttu Ittevar
koyilil yārkku māmpaḻamum vāḻaippaḻamum Uḷḷa nāḷāl nittam Aiy
vaiñcuppaḻam nicatappaṭi Iṭakkaṭavomākavum . paḻampeṟa Uṇṇātanāḷ
kaḷil Eṇṇāppūri nicatam Aiyvaiñcu cuṭṭuk kāṭṭakkaṭavomā
kavum . Ipparicu Innivantaṅkaḷ nāṅkaḷumeṅkaḷ vaṟkattārume cantirā
tittavaṟ celuttak kaṭavomāka Icaintu Innilamum Ikkācuṅ
kaikkoṇṭom Ikkoyilil Akanāḻikai civabrāhmaṇarom .
Digital edition of SII 14.191 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
